name: Hostile Takeover (MequonMan)
description:
Hostile Takeover is a local multiplayer strategy game that is played on a hexagonal grid. The goal of the game is to defeat all of the enemy flags while keeping yours safe. The game is complex yet intuitive, and all features are made to be as streamlined and understandable as possible.

The game has flaws so please comment down below or join my discord to make suggestions. http://discord.com/invite/Wk28C9x
